actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the United States should establish, at the earliest possible time, the Commonwealth of Guam.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the people of Guam are ready for self-government and that the United States should establish the Commonwealth of Guam.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the United States should establish, at the earliest possible time, the Commonwealth of Guam.
